items.title: As French budget talks restart, PM Lecornu walks political tightrope
items.summary: PARIS, Jan ‌7 (Reuters) - French Prime Minister Sebastien Lecornu is making a fresh attempt to pass the 2026 budget without ‌breaking his pledge to avoid forcing it through parliament, but lawmakers say he may have no choice, ‌risking another dangerous no-confidence vote. Coming down from its $110 price tag, we’ve seen consistent discounts on this model to $70 over 2025, mostly in the form of Prime exclusive deals, which is dropping further for folks looking for some New Year savings. You can pick it up here with a $44 markdown that lands it at the second-lowest price we have tracked – just $6 above a one-time low we spotted back in April of 2025.

items.title: EcoFlow’s latest New Year flash sale drops expanded DELTA 3 Max Plus bundle to $1,699 ($1,000 off), more from $389
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing New Year Sale, EcoFlow has launched the next of its short-term flash sales with up to 58% savings on four different offers. One such offer is the DELTA 3 Max Plus Portable Power Station with a smart extra battery for $1,699 shipped, beating out its Amazon pricing by $100. While it may have a $3,298 full price tag from the brand, it more often starts lower around $2,699 at Amazon, which has also been seeing it hold down at $1,799 since early December. You’re looking at a $1,000 markdown off the going rate (and $1,599 off the MSRP) while these flash savings last, giving you a significant companion for backup power needs at its second-lowest tracked price – $85 above the one-time low we spotted during the week of Black Friday. Head below to browse the rest of this flash sale’s lineup.

Wonder – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition + Meetup in Bellabel Park. The expansion pack for this particularly fantastic 2D Mario experience set to land in spring 2026 so it might be a good idea to score a deal on the base game before then and Woot has the proper boxed U.S. version down at $46.99 Prime shipped right now – that’s nearly 25% off and the lowest price we can find.
